quest.main.cure.beginning.title: Seeking the Cure
quest.main.cure.beginning.subtitle: There has to be more, right?
quest.main.cure.beginning.description_1:
The cure seemingly only §otreats§r the infection. It does nothing to prevent it. 
What remains in the ruined hospitals and polyclinics dwindles day by day. 
Without a means to make more, eventually, some day, it will run out.
quest.main.cure.beginning.description_2: And if it does, the last hope of restoring civilization dies with it.
quest.main.cure.beginning.description_3:
Perhaps you've learned of this truth through hard-fought survival.
Perhaps you simply wish to change the course of fate.
quest.main.cure.beginning.description_4: §oAll you need is to rediscover the cure's method of manufacture.§r
quest.main.cure.basic.title: Understanding the Basics
quest.main.cure.basic.subtitle: Know Thy Enemy
quest.main.cure.basic.description_1: The facts are simple: Despite society's rapid collapse, a §bcure§r had been made and was being distributed.
quest.main.cure.basic.description_2: Of course, that doesn't mean you can make more right now, but it wouldn't hurt to have a good stockpile in case of the worst.
quest.main.cure.basic.description_3: At the moment, your best shot of getting your hands on a large quantity would be by looting §bmedical facilities§r.
quest.main.cure.info_school.title: Gather Research - §aHighrise Residential District§r
quest.main.cure.info_school.description_: A group of students claim to have rediscovered the method for recreating the cure, but contact with them was lost soon after.
If what they say is true, the research papers should be in the §bVertical School§r.
quest.main.cure.info_plaza.title: Gather Research - §aRetail District§r
quest.main.cure.info_plaza.description_1: There are rumors that some scientists managed to take refuge in the §bTerrace Plaza Mall§r, one of the largest malls in the city.
quest.main.cure.info_plaza.description_2: You may be able to get information on the cure from them... or loot it from where they died.
quest.main.cure.info_courtyard.title: Gather Research - §aHighrise Office District§r
quest.main.cure.info_courtyard.descripti: The §bCourtyard Office§r towers above even the skyscrapers of the highrise office district.
Intel suggests a high-ranking office worker staying there has come into possession of research on the cure.
quest.main.cure.info_casino.title: Gather Research - §aHighrise Hotel District§r
quest.main.cure.info_casino.description_: Rumors suggest a key piece of the cure research is up for for sale at the §bCasino§r, every gambler’s favorite place.
Take it for yourself, or find someone who knows where it is.
quest.main.cure.info_lab.title: Gather Research - §aWasteland§r
quest.main.cure.info_lab.description_1:
§bEND OF CONTENT: This quest cannot yet be completed!§r

Visit the §bC-07 Laboratory§r and uncover the secrets behind the outbreak. Rumors claim that one of the key ingredients for the cure was produced here.
quest.main.cure.info_lab.description_2: If there is any research on the cure at all, it will definitely be found in there.
quest.main.cure.catalog.title: The Catalog
quest.main.cure.catalog.subtitle: A Brief History of the Cure
quest.main.cure.catalog.description_1: Collecting the papers only further reinforces your suspicions — a cure was made, but it was incomplete, only treating the symptons and doing nothing to prevent re-infection.
quest.main.cure.catalog.description_2: Nonetheless, it can be re-made with the help of a reagent called the §bX Factor§r, which the papers say contains materials that do not originate from this dimension.
quest.main.cure.catalog.description_3: While the stock of that reagent seems to be limited, there should be enough to make as many apples as you desire — assuming you can find it.
quest.main.cure.precursor.title: The Precursor
quest.main.cure.precursor.subtitle: Not Quite Chemical X
quest.main.cure.precursor.description_1: With both the research book and the X Factor, you are finally ready to take on the challenge of manufacturing the cure.
quest.main.cure.precursor.description_2: Automate it if you wish, or just make one trial run — the choice is yours.
quest.main.cure.cure.title: The Cure
quest.main.cure.cure.subtitle: The Scenic Route
quest.main.cure.cure.description_1: Combine Formula X with an ordinary apple to make a golden apple.
quest.main.cure.cure.description_2: If you’ve successfully automated things up to this point, congratulations — humanity has regained its ability to make a cure for the infection!
quest.main.cure.cure.description_3: However… without access to the dimension the reagent originates from, the timer has merely been delayed.
quest.main.cure.cure.description_4: §oPerhaps... perhaps we need to go deeper.§r
quest.main.cure.gasmask.title: Seeking the Source
quest.main.cure.gasmask.subtitle: The Long Journey
quest.main.cure.gasmask.description_1: Rumors say that the outbreak came from another world, the portal to which is hidden in a lab deep in what is now a radioactive wasteland… but a long journey lies ahead.
quest.main.cure.gasmask.description_2: Craft or trade for a gas mask, or find hazmat suits in hospitals — but beware, as they will only last so long.
quest.main.cure.gasmask.description_3: It’s recommended to bring extra filters for your mask, as you can right-click them while wearing it to repair.
quest.main.cure.find_wasteland.title: The Wasteland
quest.main.cure.find_wasteland.descripti:
§bEND OF CONTENT: The beta does not contain content beyond this point!§r

The source of the apocalypse, the Wasteland is all that remains after both being overrun by infected and the catastrophic meltdown of its many nuclear reactors.
Find the laboratory at the heart of it all, and uncover its secrets...
quest.main.cure.x_factor.title: The X Factor
quest.main.cure.x_factor.subtitle: *buzzer noise*
quest.main.cure.x_factor.description_1:
§bEND OF CONTENT: This quest cannot yet be completed!§r

After the cure was created, many laboratories banded together in hopes of finding a way to speed up the painfully slow production process — or subsitute the alien materials used entirely.
quest.main.cure.x_factor.description_2: Though their efforts came too late to save themselves, it seems their work was not in vain.
quest.main.cure.x_factor.description_3: While the method of making more of this reagent is now locked behind a deactivated portal, there should be enough of it left here to finish the cure — if you have the proper knowledge.
quest.main.abyss.keycard.title: The Keycard
quest.main.abyss.keycard.subtitle: The Key to the Unknown
quest.main.abyss.keycard.description_1:
It was all over the news when the creation of the gateway was completed. A new world, ripe for the picking, just waiting for the next wave of pioneers. 
The beginning of the end, though they could not have known it.
quest.main.abyss.keycard.description_2: The gateway at the heart of the lab now lies shut, and requires an activation key.
quest.main.abyss.origin.title: The Origin
quest.main.abyss.origin.subtitle: Darker Darker Yet Darker
quest.main.abyss.origin.description_1: It is time to traverse the gateway.
quest.main.abyss.origin.description_2: Use the magnetic card on the portal.
quest.main.district.radar.title: Building Radar
quest.main.district.radar.subtitle: DeceasedCraft's most awaited feature...
quest.main.district.radar.title.desc_1: Not sure what building you're at? Or want to find a specific building?
quest.main.district.radar.title.desc_2:
Craft or find a §bbuilding radar§r and charge it. You can charge it with a battery, or a charging station.

You can loot various flyers which will allow you to search for specific buildings.
quest.main.district.radar.title.desc_3: §cWARNING:§r Be aware that searching for buildings may cause lag as new chunks are generated!
quest.main.district.survivor_radar.title: Survivor Radar
quest.main.district.survivor_radar.desc_: Villagers in DeceasedCraft v5.0 have been §cremoved§r in favour of special quest NPCs.
There are several per district, and completing their quests will allow you to purchase items from them.
NPCs can be found with the §bsurvivor radar§r, a lootable item found in the §bSuburban Residential§r district, and active NPC quests can be tracked using §6[F8]§r.
quest.main.district.suburb_residential.d: A peaceful neighbourhood of small suburban houses. §aMild§r tempreature. §aLow§r threat. Your default spawn location.
quest.main.district.highrise_office.desc: A crowded district full of medium to highrise offices. §eModerate threat§r. §6Heat§r protection recommended.
quest.main.district.highrise_hotel.title: Highrise Hotel District
quest.main.district.highrise_hotel.descr: An entertainment district dominated by hotels and club venues, crowned by a megatall casino. §cHigh§r threat. §6Very hot§r!
quest.main.district.highrise_residential: A crowded highrise residential district. §eModerate§r threat. §bCold§r protection recommended.
quest.main.district.retail.title: Retail District
quest.main.district.retail.description: A sprawling retail district, the largest of which is the Terrace Plaza Mall. §cHigh§r threat. §bVery cold§r!
quest.main.district.wasteland.title: Wasteland
quest.main.district.wasteland.descriptio: A deadly, desolate district ravaged by both a nuclear reactor meltdown and the viral outbreak. §4Extreme§r threat. §4Extreme§r heat.
A gas mask or radiation protection suit is strongly recommended before entering this district.
